document.full_text: a mother who drowned herself and three of her children by intentionally driving her minivan into the hudson river was buried separately from her children on thursday after their father intervened in plans to inter them together.
document.title: on father's orders, mother who drove in river buried apart
lines_and_colors: a mother who drowned herself and three of her children by intentionally driving her minivan into the hudson river was buried separately from her children on thursday after their father intervened in plans to inter them together.
